scripts.lint: npm run lint:sol && npm run lint:js
scripts.flatten: truffle-flattener contracts/bep20/BEP20SphynxUpgradeableProxy.sol > contracts/flattened/BEP20SphynxUpgradeableProxy.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/bep20/BEP20SphynxTokenImplementation.sol > contracts/flattened/BEP20SphynxTokenImplementation.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/BSCSphynxSwapAgentImpl.sol > contracts/flattened/BSCSphynxSwapAgentImpl.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/BSCSphynxSwapAgentUpgradeableProxy.sol > contracts/flattened/BSCSwapAgentUpgradeableProxy.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/ETHSphynxSwapAgentUpgradeableProxy.sol > contracts/flattened/ETHSphynxSwapAgentUpgradeableProxy.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/ETHSphynxSwapAgentImpl.sol > contracts/flattened/ETHSphynxSwapAgentImpl.sol
scripts.generate-test: node generate-bsc-swap-agent.js --mock true && node generate-eth-swap-agent.js --mock true
